testcase.classname: As a user I should be able to see Computer Database Page
testcase.name: User navigates to the website and see Computer Database Home page with desired controls

failure.message: java.lang.AssertionError: test at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at StepDefinitions.HomePageUIValidationSDF.input_field_to_filter_the_computers_by_name_should_be_displayed(HomePageUIValidationSDF.java:42) at ✽.And input field to filter the computers by name should be displayed(HomePageUIValidation.feature:9)

testcase.failure:
Given "Chrome" is launched and user navigates to homepage...................passed When title of the page is "Computers database"..............................passed Then header of the page should display the "Play sample application — Computer database" link having "black" background color.passed And label for total computers found should be displayed.....................passed And computer database list table should be displayed........................passed And input field to filter the computers by name should be displayed.........failed And "Filter by name" button of "blue" color should be displayed.............skipped And "Add a new computer" button of "green" color should be displayed........skipped And "Next" and "Previous" buttons in the footer is visible..................skipped And pagination should be present in the footer..............................skipped
StackTrace: java.lang.AssertionError: test at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:88) at StepDefinitions.HomePageUIValidationSDF.input_field_to_filter_the_computers_by_name_should_be_displayed(HomePageUIValidationSDF.java:42) at ✽.And input field to filter the computers by name should be displayed(HomePageUIValidation.feature:9)
